attributes.action: Create One Police Force,Save Front Line Police Jobs
attributes.additional_details: One Chief constable Lose 51. One Deputy Chief Constable. Lose 51. Lose 300 Assistant Chief Constables.Have one Police force, Example British Transport. They have a framework, Total Saving about £20 to £30 million.Put the money into frontline policing.SAVING JOBS ON THE FRONT LINE.making Britain a safer place
